config.Reward Amount.name: Reward Amount
config.Reward Amount.description: Changes the amount you will receive for every 10 donations.
Mail.MuseumReward.1: Dear @,^^Thank you for your generous donations to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you this gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.2: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 20 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.3: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 30 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.4: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 40 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.5: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 50 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.6: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 60 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.7: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 70 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.8: Dear @,^^Thank you for donating 80 items to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you another gift.^^- Gunther
Mail.MuseumReward.9: Dear @,^^Thank you so much for all of your generous donations to our local museum.^^To show our gratitude, Mayor Lewis and I have sent you one last gift.^^- Gunther^^^P.S. As the museum's collection is nearly complete, we will no longer be sending you gifts in regards to every ten donations.
